original: Ljungquist, Bernt Torgny, komminister, Norrköping, f. 30/6/97 i Kisa, östergötl. 1., av köpni. Josef L. o. Edla Petersson. G. 27 m. Dagmar von Wachenfeldt. Barn: Inger f. 27, Thomas 30, Gisela 34. — Stud :ex. i Linköp. 17, teol. fil. ex. 22, teol. kand., prakt, teol. prov samt prästv. f. Linköp. stift 25. V. kommin. i Hycklinge 26, kommin. i Gustav Adolf s. å., kyrkoh. i Linderås 30, kommin. i S :t Olai förs. i Norrköp. 44. Ordf. i Norrköp. lokalavd. av fören. Norden 46. Hobbies : musik, måleri o. bokbinderi.
translated: Ljungquist, Bernt Torgny, curate, Norrköping, b. 30/6/97 in Kisa, Östergötland, 1st child of merchant Josef L. and Edla Petersson. Married on 27 m. to Dagmar von Wachenfeldt. Children: Inger b. 27, Thomas b. 30, Gisela b. 34. — Studied theology in Linköping, graduated in 1917, received degree in theology and philosophy in 1922, completed practical theological examination, and ordained as a priest for the Linköping diocese in 1925. Served as curate in Hycklinge in 1926, curate in Gustav Adolf the same year, vicar in Linderås in 1930, and curate in S:t Olai parish in Norrköping from 1944. Chairman of the Norrköping local branch of the association Norden in 1946. Hobbies: music, painting, and bookbinding.
